description: Tag a resource. A tag is a key-value pair of metadata that you associate with an Proton resource. For more information, see Proton resources and tagging in the Proton User Guide.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Proton resource to apply customer tags to.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A list of customer tags to apply to the Proton resource. (dict) --- A description of a resource tag. The key of the resource tag. The value of the resource tag.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The key of the resource tag.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The value of the resource tag.
